Sentencas: The present contribution analyses the possibilities of both Cu and bimetallic Cu-Ni formulations combined with CeO2-based oxides for their use as anodes of solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFC) for direct oxidation of methane.
Titulo: Catalytic properties of monometallic copper and bimetallic copper-nickel systems combined with ceria and Ce-X (X = Gd, Tb) mixed oxides applicable as SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of methane

Sentencas: The main objective is related to examining how the metals combination and the presence of dopants like Gd and Tb into the ceria structure could affect the catalytic activity of this type of materials towards reaction with methane.
Titulo: Catalytic properties of monometallic copper and bimetallic copper-nickel systems combined with ceria and Ce-X (X = Gd, Tb) mixed oxides applicable as SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of methane

Sentencas: For this purpose, cermets of Cu alone as well as bimetallic Cu-Ni (with 20 and 40 wt.%) have been synthesised in combination with various supports composed by oxides of Ce, Ce-Tb and Ce-Gd.
Titulo: Catalytic properties of monometallic copper and bimetallic copper-nickel systems combined with ceria and Ce-X (X = Gd, Tb) mixed oxides applicable as SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of methane

Sentencas: The behaviour of such systems towards interaction with dry methane up to 900 degrees C was analysed by means of CH4-TPR tests.
Titulo: Catalytic properties of monometallic copper and bimetallic copper-nickel systems combined with ceria and Ce-X (X = Gd, Tb) mixed oxides applicable as SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of methane

Sentencas: Appreciable differences in the catalytic activity are revealed as a function of the presence of nickel as well as Gd or Tb dopants in the systems.
Titulo: Catalytic properties of monometallic copper and bimetallic copper-nickel systems combined with ceria and Ce-X (X = Gd, Tb) mixed oxides applicable as SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of methane

Sentencas: The characteristics of carbonaceous deposits formed upon such interaction was analysed by means of TPO and XPS.
Titulo: Catalytic properties of monometallic copper and bimetallic copper-nickel systems combined with ceria and Ce-X (X = Gd, Tb) mixed oxides applicable as SOFC anodes for direct oxidation of methane
